body.p: 1. KJV spelling of Zechariah, Jehoiada’s son, in Matthew 23:35 and Luke 11:51. See Zechariah (Person) #14.
2. KJV spelling of Zechariah, John the Baptist’s father, in Luke 1:5-67. See Zechariah (Person) #31.
3. KJV spelling of Zechariah, a proposed name for John the Baptist, in Luke 1:59. See John the Baptist; Zechariah (Person) #32.
